__e: Years ago, when Helen was young, before I was famous, I was a visiting professor at the University of Michigan and I met this girl, a student of mine.
Me and my kid brother, we decided to leave Michigan and come out here, maybe dig some gold, get enough money to buy some land.
It ain't Michigan and you're not 7... but it is pretty cool, ain't it, Nate?
Mike and I are going to dinner and then we're taking a nice romantic carriage ride down Michigan Avenue.
We need to find out who's on this other side of Michigan Avenue. And this here is...
